xwikidoc.content:
skin.sheet.title=Skin skin.sheet.properties=Skin Properties skin.sheet.deprecatedProperties=Deprecated properties skin.sheet.overriddenTemplates=Overridden templates skin.sheet.addTemplate=Add a new overriding template skin.sheet.add=Add skin.sheet.overrideTemplateWarning=This section allows you to override a template of the skin. This is technical and you should be aware of the consequences. skin.sheet.deprecatedPropertiesWarning=This section is here for retro-compatibility reasons. You should use the 'overridden templates' mechanism above. skin.sheet.nojs=Without JavaScript, you cannot use this section,but you can use the {0}Object Editor{1} instead, and manually add {2} objects.
skin.sheet.js.deleting=Deleting... skin.sheet.js.deletingDone=The template has been deleted! skin.sheet.js.error.csrf=CSRF validation failed while saving. Try to refresh your browser first. skin.sheet.js.error.rights=Failed to save the skins because you don't have the rights to do it. skin.sheet.js.deleteConfirmationText=Are you sure you want to delete this template? skin.sheet.js.deleteConfirmationYes=Yes,delete it skin.sheet.js.deleteConfirmationNo=No,cancel skin.sheet.js.adding=Adding... skin.sheet.js.addingDone=The template has been added!
